datasetStructure: One record per PK parameter per time-concentration profile per subject

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable PP.USUBJID

datasetVariables.description: Unique subject identifier within the submission.

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable PP.PPSEQ

datasetVariables.description: Sequence Number given to ensure uniqueness of subject records within a domain. May be any valid number.
datasetVariables.label: Sequence Number
datasetVariables.name: PPSEQ

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable PP.PPGRPID

datasetVariables.description: Used to tie together a block of related records in a single domain to support relationships within the domain and between domains.
datasetVariables.label: Group ID
datasetVariables.name: PPGRPID

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C85839

modelClassVariable.title: Short Name of Measurement, Test or Examination

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable PP.PPTESTCD

datasetVariables.description: Short name of the pharmacokinetic parameter. It can be used as a column name when converting a dataset from a vertical to a horizontal format. The value in PPTESTCD cannot be longer than 8 characters, nor can it start with a number (e.g., "1TEST"). PPTESTCD cannot contain characters other than letters, numbers, or underscores. Examples: AUCALL, TMAX, CMAX.
datasetVariables.label: Parameter Short Name
datasetVariables.name: PPTESTCD

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C85493

modelClassVariable.title: Name of Measurement, Test or Examination

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable PP.PPTEST

datasetVariables.description: Name of the pharmacokinetic parameter. The value in PPTEST cannot be longer than 40 characters. Examples: AUC All, Time of CMAX, Max Conc.
datasetVariables.label: Parameter Name
datasetVariables.name: PPTEST

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable PP.PPCAT

datasetVariables.description: Used to define a category of related records. For PP, this should be the name of the analyte in PCTEST whose profile the parameter is associated with.
datasetVariables.label: Parameter Category
datasetVariables.name: PPCAT

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable PP.PPSCAT

datasetVariables.description: Categorization of the model type used to calculate the PK parameters. Examples include COMPARTMENTAL, NON-COMPARTMENTAL.
datasetVariables.label: Parameter Subcategory
datasetVariables.name: PPSCAT

priorVersion.title: Result or Finding in Original Units

datasetVariables.description: Result of the measurement or finding as originally received or collected.
datasetVariables.label: Result or Finding in Original Units
datasetVariables.name: PPORRES

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable PP.PPORRESU

datasetVariables.description: Original units in which the data were collected. The unit for PPORRES. Example: ng/L.
datasetVariables.label: Original Units
datasetVariables.name: PPORRESU

modelClassVariable.title: Result or Finding in Standard Format

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable PP.PPSTRESC

datasetVariables.description: Contains the result value for all findings, copied or derived from PPORRES in a standard format or standard units. PPSTRESC should store all results or findings in character format; if results are numeric, they should also be stored in numeric format in PPSTRESN.
datasetVariables.label: Character Result/Finding in Standard Format
datasetVariables.name: PPSTRESC

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable PP.PPSTRESN

datasetVariables.description: Used for continuous or numeric results or findings in standard format; copied in numeric format from PPSTRESC. PPSTRESN should store all numeric test results or findings.
datasetVariables.label: Numeric Result/Finding in Standard Units
datasetVariables.name: PPSTRESN

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C85494

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable PP.PPSTRESU

datasetVariables.description: Standardized unit used for PPSTRESC and PPSTRESN.
datasetVariables.label: Standard Units
datasetVariables.name: PPSTRESU

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66789

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable PP.PPSTAT

datasetVariables.description: Used to indicate that a parameter was not calculated. Should be null if a result exists in PPORRES.
datasetVariables.label: Completion Status
datasetVariables.name: PPSTAT

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable PP.PPREASND

datasetVariables.description: Describes why a parameter was not calculated, such as INSUFFICIENT DATA. Used in conjunction with PPSTAT when value is NOT DONE.
datasetVariables.label: Reason Parameter Not Calculated
datasetVariables.name: PPREASND

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C78734

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable PP.PPSPEC

datasetVariables.description: Defines the type of specimen used for a measurement. If multiple specimen types are used for a calculation (e.g., serum and urine for renal clearance), then this field should be left blank. Examples: SERUM, PLASMA, URINE.
datasetVariables.label: Specimen Material Type
datasetVariables.name: PPSPEC

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable PP.PPDTC

datasetVariables.description: Nominal date/time of parameter calculations.
datasetVariables.label: Date/Time of Parameter Calculations
datasetVariables.name: PPDTC

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable PP.PPRFTDTC

datasetVariables.description: Date/time of the reference time point from the PC records used to calculate a parameter record. The values in PPRFTDTC should be the same as that in PCRFTDTC for related records.
datasetVariables.label: Date/Time of Reference Point
datasetVariables.name: PPRFTDTC

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable PP.PPSTINT

datasetVariables.description: The start of a planned evaluation or assessment interval relative to the Time Point Reference.
datasetVariables.label: Planned Start of Assessment Interval
datasetVariables.name: PPSTINT

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable PP.PPENINT

datasetVariables.description: The end of a planned evaluation or assessment interval relative to the Time Point Reference.
datasetVariables.label: Planned End of Assessment Interval
datasetVariables.name: PPENINT

description: A findings domain that contains pharmacokinetic parameters derived from pharmacokinetic concentration-time (PC) data. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, DOMAIN, C49607, 2018-06-29)
label: Pharmacokinetic Parameters
name: PP
